website_summaries.verdict: An attractive faux-leather watch winder with pre-programmed turns.
pros: With the higher price tag comes higher performance
Unlike many less expensive watch winders, this WOLF will last you quite a while
Can be powered by battery or with included international power adapter
cons: This winder may not wind your watch sufficiently

customer_reviews.title: Great For You and Your Watch.
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought this on Amazon a few weeks ago, at a 72% discount to list, that price price has jumped almost $30.00. I am very happy with my deal. This item is of excellent quality. It handles my Rolex Yachtmaster silently and keeps it wound just right. Very convenient. If you have a really costly watch this winder will save you money on maintenance in the long run, reducing wear on the mainspring and stem. I would not pay the $400.00 list price, however.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Daly

customer_reviews.title: Great watch winder!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Wolf watch winder that I've purchased and I love them all! I should probably upgrade to a larger (multiple watch) model at some point, but I'm good with the singles that I have right now. This model is nice 'n' quiet and keeps my automatic watch wound. I don't think it works on the Seiko Kinetic type of watches, though, even though it has a left-right feature (I think it goes 5 turns left, then 5 turns right), as well as a left, and right turn feature. Additionally, it has a 12-hr rest feature, which I believe is meant to prevent over-winding of your watch. This is a great product and I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: L G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Winder
customer_reviews.text: I treated myself to a Breitling Navitimer GMT and I wanted a good autowinder. I googled and went on YouTube, Wolf was way up there in the top 10 winders. I got he Wolf Heritage and I love it. You can’t even tell it’s on, super quiet and so far working flawlessly. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: kevin jones

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one month and then failed
customer_reviews.text: This watch winder worked for one month and then stopped rotating in any setting. When I attempted to receive a warranty replacement, I received an email from their customer support that told me that I did not know how to operate the winder. Unfortunately, that was not the case and the winder is junk.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: We really wanted these to work and liked them. Our watches are 30 and 40 years ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 Rolex watches and 2 winder boxes and neither kept the time. Both winders were plugged in, we watched them rotate, checked the rotation, tried different rotation combinations, you name it, etc. We even wound our watches manually, put in, and checked after 5 days and both were stopped. I cannot see what we could have done wrong. We really wanted these to work and liked them. Our watches are 30 and 40 years old, so that may have been a problem. We service them regularly. We put 3 stars not knowing why they did not work and hopefully get some feedback. We returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars for the 2 years it worked
customer_reviews.text: Just over 2 years (the warranty happens to be 2 years) my Wolf winder stopped working. after the typical customer support run around they offered to repair it for more than I paid for, plus shipping and handling. STAY AWAY! Don’t waste your money on this inferior watch winder. The hunt is now on for a new watch winder, one thing for sure I will never, ever purchase anything from Wolf again. Totally dis-pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch0407

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMENDED BY ALL WATCH FORUMS
customer_reviews.text: Lots of watch forums swear by Wolf winders, especially for sensitive watches like Breitling or Rolex. This is the way to go, cheaper winders can over-wind and permanently damage your watch. If you buy a cheap winder, you'll soon forget the few dollars you saved when your watch is ruined.
customer_reviews.author: none of your business

customer_reviews.title: NOPE.  Not a good winder.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a Rolex Submariner. It did not wind the watch enough. We tried all of the settings. Thinking that it was defective, I had Amazon send a replacement; however, the replacement did not work any better. The watch stops after a day or so after staying in the winder for a day. If I wear the watch everyday, it doesn't stop, so I know it's not an issue with the watch. I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Brazzeldazzle

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Worked well until it died a little under 3 years. For the price it's not worth the investment. Customer support seems non existent, haven't heard anything back within a week regarding how to get it fixed. For being a top rated watch winder company, their products don't seem to have much longevity for the price they charge. Edit: After multiple emails to the company with no response I researched for other repair options. Turns out their winders are not repairable at all. Expect to have a useless expensive box if you do purchase a winder from Wolf.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was beautiful - professional and well executed
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was beautiful - professional and well executed. Unfortunately, the product itself is junk. Cheaply made, poor fit and finish, and broken right out of the gate. Don't waste your money on this item. My search for a high quality watch winder continues...
customer_reviews.author: Morpheus1041

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My BF got this for me for our anniversary. Quiet, works perfectly, spinning in both directions and pausing so it doesn't over wind. My only negative is there is a blinking light while it's spinning, since it's next to my bed it's a little irritating. Will probably put a bit of electrical tape over it and see if that helps. Otherwise beautifully crafted, sturdy and great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works, and not just for a week or two
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Just buy it. If you have a decent watch that needs to be wound this is the winder for you. Don't be a cheapskate with a Rolex or even a $200 Seiko and get a knockoff winder at $50. THEY DONT WORK. These do. The only real issue is that you should wait until the price is right (around the holidays) and really evaluated if you want a multi-watch winder. Other than that, if you have a decent time piece, this is the watch winder you want.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P.

customer_reviews.title: I probably just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning it. Per advice on watchuseek, I took a compass and sure enough, as soon as it got near the winder, the compass needle wouldn't sit still. I tried it from different areas, including where the watch is held by the winder, and it just clearly doesn't have adequate magnetic shielding. I probably just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: axio

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my Rolex GMT Master II!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for almost two months for my Rolex GMT Master II (Batman) and so far it's been excellent. There's no noise (as far as I can notice), it looks awesome on my desk (some people spend more time complimenting the winder than my watch), and I haven't to had to manually wind my watch since I started using it. I wear this watch a couple of times of week so it would sometimes need to be wound manually and every time I would have to reset the time, date, and GMT time (pain in the neck).
customer_reviews.author: FB88

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product - Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this winder, but almost from the start I had problems with it. It didn't keep my watch wound from the beginning and one month after having it, it completely stopped working. I highly do not recommend purchasing this winder. It just doesn't work and then breaks down.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and works beyond my expectation. The product description is great, but reality is better! Started quickly easy to set up - took 5 minutes. My auto-watch is in the winder and fit perfectly with the adjustable cushion. The watch stays where you put on the pillow and the pillow locks in place in the winder. The controls are easy to use with very clear instructions on how to set the units operation. This winder is not just quite - it is SILENT! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Blford

customer_reviews.title: Runs silent
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a week, well made. I was worried it would make noise but it runs silent. Watch keeps perfect time. I’ve had a Rolex for 12 years and waited to long to get one. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is it’s only been a week. It’s all about durability and I can’t comment on that yet but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Heineman

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great, value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, aesthetically very pleasing, works well, silent. 900TPD (in A or B setting) or 1,800TPD (in C setting) are adequate for most watches. Wolf's experience in making jewel boxes combined with their excellent winding mechanisms have made a great product. Pricing is all over the place and should be more carefully thought by the management of the company.
customer_reviews.author: cambridgeguy

customer_reviews.title: Silent, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: When people said it was silent, I figured they meant ALMOST silent, but honestly, I can't hear the motor at all. No slight whirring sound, nothing at all. I think it's really well insulated, especially with the "leather." I'm not even sure if it's real or faux leather without checking the description again, but it looks like genuine leather. Very nice looking, maybe a bit larger than you'd expect it to be. A bit pricey, but so far it seems worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Hale

customer_reviews.title: I looked through pretty much all watch winder manufacturer online
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a watch winder, you probably care about making sure your precious watch stays in the top condition that it deserves. I looked through pretty much all watch winder manufacturer online, and this winder is the only winder that is reasonably priced and has elegant finish that goes along with my Rolex. If you go read about the company itself, you will also find out that this is a company that has been making nothing but cases for a very long time. I also noticed that several Torneau stores carry this winder, which serves as another sign of approval.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Third one
customer_reviews.text: Bought my third one and they are outstanding in quality, operation and keep my Seamaster, Sinn and IWC properly wound. Price has increased $30 since my last one a few months ago so that's a bit much but if you're going to invest in the watch, put it on the winder many watchmakers use and recommend without hesitation. Wish they were not so large and space consuming or offered some storage or other accommodation at this size but obviously I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Knotsofast

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed it for. I prefer not to wear a watch over the weekend. In the past my watch didn't have a problem keeping time over a weekend without me wearing it everyday. However, it is now nearly ten years old and doesn't stay charged after a couple of days of none use. This device has kept my watch running through those periods of none use without losing time. Come Monday morning it is ready to go. Great buy at the discounted purchase price offered by Amazon. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: khood

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied consumer
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough great things about this product. Bang for the buck, this is a great purchase. I have an Omega and this winder works very well. It is a large case and feels like it is of sturdy construction. The winder makes no noise as it sits by my bedside. The packaging is great as well. I was impressed as it felt like I was unwrapping an apple product.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: This winder looks amazing. It was packaged with the care of a high end watch. It looks beautiful sitting out on the dresser. It works flawlessly plugged in or running on batteries and keeps our watches running without losing or gaining time when not being worn. It has exceeded our expectations and would definitely buy again or buy for a gift. It looks like I spent far more on it then I did.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought a second one as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: This little display case spins to keep your luxury watches ticking as they should is perfect. Silent and silky just what you need on your nightstand. I love tucking my Rolex to sleep every night in this quality piece of workmanship!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Watch winder that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. After trying six other winders, this is the only winder that I have tried that can keep my watch working properly for weeks. None of the others do it for more than a weekend. It's expensive but very reasonably priced given the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mysecretavatar

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: The Wolf quality reputation is well deserved...This is my second Wolf winder (the first is still going strong after many years)...The other winders that I have may be less expensive but they do not last and do not have the operating controls that this winder does...Have 72 watches in my collection and much experience with winders...Wolf is simply the best.
customer_reviews.author: REJ

customer_reviews.title: Lack of instructions
customer_reviews.text: No instructions on how to attach the watch. And if the attachment, to which the watch is strapped, is not snapped in properly, the winder does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Pat P

customer_reviews.title: Quality?
customer_reviews.text: Great watch winder while it worked. Died at just over 2 years with a 2 year warranty. When you spend this kind of money for a watch winder it should last longer than it did. Thought you get what you pay for after going through a number of cheaper models. Guess not, it doesn’t appear any of them are built to last. I suggest you save your money and buy the cheaper models knowing you will have to replace after a year to two years.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M

customer_reviews.title: Winder keeps my watch from losing time
customer_reviews.text: I keep a Submariner on this and it does a great job of keeping it wound. Have had it on for a few weeks and didn't lose any time. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Craig's Experience

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely quiet & smooth as silk
customer_reviews.text: Rolex Submariner fits perfectly and the cusion the watch is fitted around seats very securely in place with no "wobble". Adjusted the setting to "C" for alternating clockwise & counter-clockwise rotations and turned switch to "On" and it is working perfectly with the blinking green light assuring me all is well. Will be getting a second Wolf Heritage for my wife's Rolex as the other brand of winder that she has been using is very substandard in comparison and she already has her eye on my Wolf winder. Great product, will soon be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... few times but it is quiet and does a good job keeping the watch wound
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a few times but it is quiet and does a good job keeping the watch wound. The delayed start is nice. You can take the watch off Fri night and put it in the machine. Since it is wound from wearing it, the delayed start is a nice feature. Saw others where the cord had to be purchased separately. This one includes everything you need. The battery option is nice. Also comes with multiple adapters for international travel.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Stamp

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, But Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is quiet. Also looks good on the dresser. I’m not fond of the cushy pillow thing that holds the watch, however, and the unit is quite expensive. Overall , though, I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Richard N. Staples

customer_reviews.title: Excellent winder and a real bargain
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made and silent when operating. I really love this winder. My only issue is that the pillow does not fit a closed wristband that is set for a smaller wrist. As a result, I mount my watch on the pillow with the clasp open. It works but doesn't fit very well. I understand there is an accessory pillow and would like to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Keith D. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable Winder
customer_reviews.text: The winder worked first few hours and then it went to rest (coma) for15 hours until I touched the ON button. The winder is going back. WHY IS AMAZON REFUSING TO ISSUE REFUND?
customer_reviews.author: Ljubinka Tobdzic

customer_reviews.title: work as expected. Ultra quiet. The noise was ...
customer_reviews.text: work as expected. Ultra quiet. The noise was extremely important to me and if My wife says she cannot hear it, then it is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Chafic

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a short while but it seems to be working great. Keeps my watch wound and looks classy. The light blinks every once in a while to let you know it's on. I also like that you can put D batteries in jt, in addition to plugging it in. So if the power goes out the watch will stay wound. It's a nice added touch. The only con, I wish they used real leather rather than faux leather. Aside from that, I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ITrob523

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, quality Watch Winder at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is excellent. Very quiet. Somehow larger than expected, but looks good.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN OBRIEN

customer_reviews.title: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great watch winder. Virtually silent, stylish and efficient. I believe it has a 800-900 rpd setting. Note: The little pillow is a bit firm at first but can be smushed to fit your watch snugly. Has setting to wind left, right or to both sides. It is not a continuous wind; it rests and starts several times a day and does a few intervals at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian River

customer_reviews.title: Best watch winder
customer_reviews.text: Love my new watch winder. Quality made and works like a dream. Best one out there in my option. I have a ladies Rolex and it works beautifully on this. Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: B. Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Rolex still loses a couple of minutes
customer_reviews.text: My Rolex still loses a couple of minutes even though I put it in the winder every night. A little disappointing since this is exactly what I was trying to avoid by purchasing the winder. The unit was fairly pricey so I was hoping it would eliminate the need for me to re-set my watch.
customer_reviews.author: Scotudy

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about a year and a half.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Tag and it worked well for a while but stopped about 6 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ron R.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought it would be, but SILENT
customer_reviews.text: Silence was what I was after and the fact that batteries could be used, but it's way bigger than I thought it would be so unlikely to fit into a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barely Makes a Sound
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly Quiet, Works as advertised. Just what I needed to hold my watch. I am glad I got this Wolf as I never even hear it, but it rotates smoothly at regular intervals and keeps my watch working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Nix

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have a more expensive brand and this one is by far much better and easier to use! A must have if your watch needs to be in constant motion when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Marginally effective
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really keep my Rolex wound correctly but is better than nothing. Expensive for what it does, even at the discounted Amazon price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P.

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for placing on a nightstand without having to worry ...
customer_reviews.text: When searching for a watch winder, my main consideration was I wanted to find one that was completely silent. Of course, the look of the winder was a big consideration as well. This product fits the bill on both counts. It is an elegant, well built winder and makes absolutely zero noise. It is perfect for placing on a nightstand without having to worry about it making any noise. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Woodburn

customer_reviews.title: SILENT
customer_reviews.text: This is my first watch winder, being used for a Breitling. A bit larger than expected, but SILENT, which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Oborodzuki

customer_reviews.title: This is a great watch winder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch winder, well worth the money. Well made, absolutely silent operation, great for bedroom, doesn't keep me up all night like my old Rapport winder. I own several Breitling 44 mm big watches and they fit well in this winder. Well packaged and arrived fast.
customer_reviews.author: Karlug

customer_reviews.title: Wolf watch winder is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: This watch winder is the best hands down. It makes no noise, has different settings and looks really nice. My watch fits perfectly snug on the pillow. It costs a little more than others but your watch probably cost several times more.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Garcia

customer_reviews.title: ... this if your wife has a very small wrist like mine does
customer_reviews.text: Don't order this if your wife has a very small wrist like mine does. There is no way I could get my wife's Rolex to fit. Otherwise, it appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kaboom

customer_reviews.title: Large High Quality Winder
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality watch winder that uses either batteries or electricity. It is very well made, Was shipped promptly. My only negative is that it's big and takes up a lot of space for just one watch. However, I'm reasonably sure that it is one of the highest quality winders on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Stoever

customer_reviews.title: Great build and quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Cant say much, is a great build and quality device, is veryyy silent, you cant hear the motor even if you get close to the winder, i love it! I had another wolf winder before and lasted for more than 6 years so im back :)
customer_reviews.author: liliana ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Not only a beautiful piece but it is silent and works perfectly. Very happy with purchase and would highly recommend. Arrived packaged very well so no damage at all.
customer_reviews.author: djackson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've had this winder for a few weeks and it works great. Operation is quiet and it feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Quality, sturdy watch winder
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought the WOLF 270002 Single Watch Winder for my new 2019 Rolex DateJust. So far so good, I've only been using it for several weeks. The watch winder is very quiet compared to other watch winders. It is easy to set up... I am using battery for this winder so I have to make sure to replace the battery as needed.
customer_reviews.author: LuvBirkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. My husband doesn't wear his Rolex very often and this winder keeps the time perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Courtois

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Father's day. So far it is working wonderfully. The price was higher than I had expected to pay but after reading the reviews on the lesser costly models and all the trouble they were having I chose to skip that frustration. The case is very handsome and well made. The instructions were simple and most of all my husband loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom's Mom

customer_reviews.title: All wound up
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Wife loves it. Had Rolex for 12 years without a winder. Mistake to wait so long. Cool to watch it do it’s thing. Looks really good. High quality. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nutlse

customer_reviews.title: Very dependable
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these for 4 years and it's still working. My wife gave me another auto-winding watch for my birthday so I purchased another one of these. They are very dependable. You do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: AlphaPepper

customer_reviews.title: This is the go to winder
customer_reviews.text: Quiet. Classic. Perfect for my antique Rolex. Bi-directional rotation. And I did say quiet.... right next to bed and can not hear it at all!!
customer_reviews.author: 69 Camaro

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband's new watch and it works perfectly. Like that it can be plugged in or run by batteries. A better price than others I checked out.
customer_reviews.author: Eric & Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Silent, but big.
customer_reviews.text: The winder works great- it is whisper silent. However... It's HUGE. I assumed it would be a small square like the size of a tennis ball. I was totally wrong- it's more like the size of a tissue box. Make sure to check the dimensions before you buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelscar

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really satisfied with this winder. I’ve only had it for a week, but it’s quiet, easy to operate, and looks great. Very high quality for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is crap. I cannot believe what they are charging.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not maintain a decent wind. After two days it starts to lose time.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This winder is silent and keeps my watch wound, what more is there?
customer_reviews.author: tourglide

customer_reviews.title: It's well made and looks good on the dresser
customer_reviews.text: It's well made and looks good on the dresser, it's absolutely silent when spinning. Keeps my automatics wound when I swap them out for wear.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in GA

customer_reviews.title: Wolf is great. Keeps my watch current
customer_reviews.text: Wolf is great. Keeps my watch current. I don't wear it alot and it was a pain to keep the date current. The packaging was excellent. (the box it came in was so nice you don't want to throw it away.) The winding case comes with a velvet cover to keep the dust off. (opening the winder could expose the inner winder with dust.)
customer_reviews.author: S. T. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE ...
customer_reviews.text: Next to no noise level. Nice Craftsmanship and sleek Style .. AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Franco

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality piece of equipment. Especially like that it will run off wall or battery power. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 4RunnerFan

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Good Time
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats a Wolf when it comes to watch winders. It keeps perfect time on our Breitling watches. Tried a cheaper winder and it just didn't work like a Wolf.
customer_reviews.author: BG8990

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! When it comes on you can't even hear it it's so quiet you'll sleep right thru and it looks like a real display on my dresser ,I had another cheaper model and it was the worst. 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: tito

customer_reviews.title: Great watch winder
customer_reviews.text: This winder is very quiet! This was an important factory as have it in my bedroom. Previous winder I had was noisy and had to put in another room. Seems to keep my watch working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: shopper99

customer_reviews.title: High end product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived packaged beautifully. Very attractive product. Extremely quiet during operation. The reviews were positive and correct. Definitely worth the price which is not out of line because the quality is there.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great winder
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Holt

customer_reviews.title: Quality Automatic Watch Winder
customer_reviews.text: This winder keeps my watch wound, when I am unable to wear it for hours on end.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect... Testing reliability before ordering another winder for second watch...
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS G. SPEGAR JR.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Father’s Day gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband for father’s day! He loved it! The only negative thing I have to say is how big and bulky it is. He travels for work so unfortunately he can’t pack it.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrianne

customer_reviews.title: great winder
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The build feels very solid. It's totally silent even with my ear up close. One small problem is that I have a small wrist and it's difficult to close the clasp around the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: road warrior

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect with which to keep those high dollar collectable mechanical watches gently wound to maintain movement while in storage. Usable for overnight or prolonged storage.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K. Glandorf

customer_reviews.title: It is silent
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing and it is amazing as one would expect from Wolf. The best thing about this is that it is virtually silent. I basically have to have my ear on its side to hear it ever so slightly. This is perfect since it sits on my night stand right next to my head!
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Zaman

customer_reviews.title: WOLF 270002 Heritage Single Watch Winder
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Works beautifully on my Ladies Rolex. Simple "set -up- instructions" to follow. Beautiful box, looks great AND works great!
customer_reviews.author: 10Rose

customer_reviews.title: Tick tock
customer_reviews.text: Great product as I have several Wolf winders already. Just wish that it had the connection cable so that I could run it in series with the others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Only have had it a week
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only have had it a week. It is easy to use and it is very quiet. Cannot hear it at all on the bedside table. Ive had other winders that just dont last. Hopefully this one will be around for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, classic look.
customer_reviews.text: High quality leather case, easy to setup and use. Simple and classic look (as pictured in black). My Tag Heuer fits fine, and it keeps ticking!
customer_reviews.author: TechDude

customer_reviews.title: Good  two year warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Quite operation. Even though many watches only require 650 to 800 turns per day such as my Corum , knowing that your winder is 900 won't adversely affect my timepiece. Also, Wolf has a good reputation for quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Philip j

customer_reviews.title: So quiet you forget it’s there!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Looks nice but most importantly it’s quiet. I’ve had winders in the past where they are super noisy and distracting at times. This is impossible to hear and works exactly as it’s supposed to. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Wang

customer_reviews.title: Doing what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be functioning within expected parameters. Easy to use. A bit large for a single watch winder.
customer_reviews.author: MATTHEW PERETZ

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the quality and reliability. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This the third Wolf winder I purchase. This model is a great value for quality and reliability. First ones have now 3yrs of constant daily use, no problems to report. I would definitely reommend Wolf watch winders for your automatic pieces, even the higher ends.
customer_reviews.author: aziur11

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd WOLF winder I have ordered (too many watches?) and they all are great quality, and function as expected. Nice feature for starting with a a wound watch or one that is dead, and the various clockwise/counterclockwise option.
customer_reviews.author: M.Miller

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my dresser
customer_reviews.text: Inaudible. Winds my watch. Looks great on my dresser. Comes with a power supply. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: IFK

customer_reviews.title: Great product would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks great and is silent. I mean I put my ear on it and can hear zero noise.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm very pleased but I've had it for only over a week.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep Rolex Submariner wound
customer_reviews.text: Simply doesn’t work with the Rolex Submariner. The Wolf rotates, but doesn’t keep my watch wound.
customer_reviews.author: Erpilot

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for it to fail completely...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's Tag Heuer. The product works as described, but it started making noise a few months after I purchased it. It makes an ominous grinding noise when the movement is active. Not a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine B. Slack

customer_reviews.title: Works really good, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works really good, worth the money. It has been working everyday for the last year and a half flawlessly. Best product.
customer_reviews.author: Truongsi1

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Well made watch winder! So glad I read the reviews on the various winders before purchasing. A surprise for my husband and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: First Class watch winder
customer_reviews.text: First Class, high quality watch winder! This is a must for your valuable time piece. Ultra quiet operation, classy design that fits well in your room
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: It works so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far all is good works as advertised. Have only had it about a week. Check back in 6-12 months.
customer_reviews.author: dman

product_meta.title: WOLF 270002 Heritage Single Watch Winder with Cover, Black
product_meta.description:
Trouble Shooting Steps: All WOLF winders are designed to have cycles rest between its winding cycles to ensure that the proper amount of tension is placed on the main spring of your watch. All watch cycles will take approximately 6 hours of winding and rest, and then will go into a 18 hour sleep phase before returning back to the winding cycles. When placing the cuff inside of the drum, please ensure that the watch strap is fastened securely so that the watch does not sway back and forth during its winding. Once you place the cuff inside of the drum, you will hear a clicking noise that will indicate when each side of the cuff is locked into the drum. All WOLF winders utilize gravity to rotate the rotor inside of your watch. This means that if the face of the watch is pointed towards the ceiling or ground, the rotor inside of your watch will be prohibited from rotating and therefore will not receive power.




PRODUCT DETAILS

 * International Shipping:This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars492 ratings Trouble Shooting Steps: All WOLF winders are designed to have cycles rest between its winding cycles to ensure that the proper amount of tension is placed on the main spring of your watch. All watch cycles will take approximately 6 hours of winding and rest, and then will go into a 18 hour sleep phase before returning back to the winding cycles. When placing the cuff inside of the drum, please ensure that the watch strap is fastened securely so that the watch does not sway back and forth during its winding. Once you place the cuff inside of the drum, you will hear a clicking noise that will indicate when each side of the cuff is locked into the drum. All WOLF winders utilize gravity to rotate the rotor inside of your watch. This means that if the face of the watch is pointed towards the ceiling or ground, the rotor inside of your watch will be prohibited from rotating and therefore will not receive power.
feature_bullets: 1 winding module, glass cover, chrome finished hardware, lock in cuff
Pre-programmed - 900 turns per day. Directional Settings: Clockwise, Anticlockwise and Bi-directional

Battery or Power Option with Universal Power adapator. Smooth faux leather and satin lining. Watch Cuff- The cuff has been designed to fit bigger and heavier watches (up to 52mm case). The new design "locks" the cuff into the rotator drum for a secure fit
Patented Innovation - Every WOLF winder counts the precise number of rotations. All other winder estimate the number of rotations.
